Package ar.edu.utn.frc.tup.lc.iv.controllers

Class ChargeController

java.lang.Object
ar.edu.utn.frc.tup.lc.iv.controllers.ChargeController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/charges") public class ChargeController extends Object
REST controller for charge management.

This class handles incoming HTTP requests related to charge operations, including adding a charge, registering a penalty and retrieving all charges.

      @PostMapping("/fines") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<FineResponseDTO> registerFine(@Valid @RequestBody @Valid FineRequestDTO fineRequestDTO)
      POST fineRequestDTO record.
      Parameters:
      fineRequestDTO - which fetches all the data to register a fine as a charge.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity the HTTP Status of FineResponseDTO if it has been registered.

    • getChargesOfFinesByLotId

      Parameters:
      id - of the related lot
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity the HTTP Status with a list of FinesResponseDTO for lot.

    • updateChargeFine

      @PutMapping("/fines/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<FineResponseDTO> updateChargeFine(@PathVariable("id") Long fineId, @Valid @RequestBody @Valid FineUpdateDTO fineUpdateDTO)
      PUT Update the charge of a fine.
      Parameters:
      fineId - of the fine to update.
      fineUpdateDTO - DTO with the data needed to update the Fine charge.
      Returns:
      EntityResponse the HTTP Status with a TRUE or False indicating if the charge has been modified or if an error has occurred.

    • addCharge

      @PostMapping("") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ChargeResponseDTO> addCharge(@Valid @RequestBody @Valid ChargeDTO chargeRequestDTO, @RequestHeader("x-user-id") Long idUser)
      POST chargeRequestDTO registration.
      Parameters:
      chargeRequestDTO - containing all the data to record a charge to the batch.
      idUser - the user id.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity the HTTP status of chargeResponseDTO if it has been registered.

    • getAllCharges

      @GetMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<org.springframework.data.domain.Page<ChargeResponseDTO>> getAllCharges(@RequestParam(defaultValue="0") int page, @RequestParam(defaultValue="10") int size, @ModelAttribute ChargeFilters chargeFilter)
      GET List of all charges.
      Parameters:
      page - the page number to retrieve (starting from 0).
      size - the number of items per page.
      chargeFilter - all the filters.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity the HTTP status with a list of chargeResponseDTO

    • updateCharge

      @PutMapping("/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ChargeResponseDTO> updateCharge(@PathVariable("id") Long chargeId, @Valid @RequestBody @Valid ChargeUpdateDTO chargeUpdateDTO, @RequestHeader("x-user-id") Long idUser)
      PUT chargeUpdateDTO update of a charge.
      Parameters:
      chargeId - id of charge a update.
      chargeUpdateDTO - containing all the data to update
      idUser - id of the user who performs it a charge.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity the HTTP status of chargeResponseDTO if it has been update.

      Parameters:
